about_the_game:
Game Description
You control three employees of a cleaning company, carrying out their jobs, but be careful, as engaging in activities outside of work may lead to undesirable outcomes. There are three levels in the game, and you can choose any level to enter freely. The game has three possible endings, which vary based on your choices. The gameplay lasts approximately 10 minutes.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Gameplay/Controls
This is a graphic-text game that can be played simply by using the mouse to click.
*Click anywhere on the screen to initiate dialogue.
*Click on objects to interact with them.
*Choose YES or NO to make narrative choices.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes/Instructions
Please consider the following points as a reference to assess whether you need to purchase:
*The gameplay duration of this game is 10 minutes or less.
*The author is not a native English speaker, so there may be discrepancies in translation.
If, unfortunately, you have purchased this game and the gaming experience is unsatisfactory, feel free to use the STEAM system for refunds.

content_descriptors.notes: May contain content unsuitable for all age groups or inappropriate for viewing at work: occasional violence and graphic content.

name: Panpu-ja

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: intel i3
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 640
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: windows media player required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: intel i5
  • Memory: 120 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 640
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Sound Card: windows media player required
